articles.content: A year ago, by late July, Ian Happ was hitting just .175/.286/.315/67 wRC+. The strikeouts were still an issue. The walks were declining. The power wasn’t there. And the quality of contact was abysma… [+1504 chars]

articles.title: Mac Jones not included in ESPN's new 2022 ranking of NFL's top quarterbacks - NBC Sports Boston
articles.description: Is Mac Jones a top-tier quarterback in the NFL? One prominent offseason ranking didn't include the Patriots star on its latest list.
articles.content: Mac Jones had a tremendous rookie season for the New England Patriots in 2021, but he still doesn't rank among the NFL's top 10 or top 15 quarterbacks in many of the latest offseason rankings and lis… [+1937 chars]

articles.author: Jeff Passan
articles.title: Atlanta Braves trade Drew Waters, Andrew Hoffmann, CJ Alexander to Kansas City Royals for 35th pick - ESPN
articles.description: The Braves have traded prospects Drew Waters, Andrew Hoffmann and CJ Alexander to the Royals for the 35th pick in the draft. Atlanta now has the ninth-most available slot money in the draft after the deal.
articles.content: The Atlanta Braves acquired the 35th pick in Sunday's Major League Baseball draft from the Kansas City Royals for center-field prospect Drew Waters, right-handed pitching prospect Andrew Hoffmann and… [+1475 chars]

articles.description: The Pirates and Marlins both have losing records but head into Monday with momentum. Which team will pick up another win in the series opener?
